import React, { useRef } from 'react'; import { Form, Container, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import "../styles/querys.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from 'axios' export default function SignUp () { const api = axios.create({ baseURL: 'http://localhost:8000' }) const createUser = async () => { console.log('FUNC') return await api.post('/signup', { "fullname": "Mateo Pereira", "username": "mateo_per", "email": "mateo@gmail.com", "password":"1234" }) } return( <>
Sign Up!
Full name Username Email Password We'll never share your information with anyone else. Accept Terms of Service
Already have an account? Sign in!
) }
